product_name: Fizik Antares Versus X K:ium Saddle - Men's
long_description: Lightly padded with a deep center channel for comfort, the 240g Fizik Antares Versus X K:ium Bike Saddle offers a high-performance saddle to cyclists having a moderate range of flexibility.
